Tanks

类 Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a projectile in the Tanks game.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Projectile(float x, float y, int[] RGB, Tank tank)
      Constructs a Projectile object.

      Draws the explosion of the projectile.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(float x,
                  float y,
                  int[] RGB,
                  Tank tank)
        Constructs a Projectile object.
        参数:
        x - the x-coordinate of the projectile
        y - the y-coordinate of the projectile
        RGB - the RGB color values of the projectile
        tank - the tank that fired the projectile

    • 方法详细资料

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(Level level)
        Sets the level for the projectile.
        参数:
        level - the level object

      • fire

        public void fire(float xVel,
                 float yVel)
        Fires the projectile with the given velocities.
        参数:
        xVel - the x-velocity of the projectile
        yVel - the y-velocity of the projectile

      • checkCollided

        public boolean checkCollided(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Checks if the projectile has collided with any terrain or gone out of bounds.
        参数:
        app - the PApplet object
        返回:
        true if the projectile has collided, false otherwise

      • explode

        public void explode()
        Explodes the projectile, modifying the terrain if necessary.

      • updatePixelLines

        public void updatePixelLines()
        Updates the pixel lines in the level.

      • tick

        public void tick(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Updates the state of the projectile.
        参数:
        app - the PApplet object

      • isCollided

        public boolean isCollided()
        Checks if the projectile has collided with terrain.
        返回:
        true if the projectile has collided, false otherwise

      • isExploded

        public boolean isExploded()
        Checks if the projectile has exploded.
        返回:
        true if the projectile has exploded, false otherwise

      • updateWindSpeed

        public void updateWindSpeed(float windSpeed)
        Updates the wind speed.
        参数:
        windSpeed - the new wind speed

      • setX

        public void setX(float x)
        Sets the x-coordinate of the projectile.
        参数:
        x - the new x-coordinate

      • setY

        public void setY(float y)
        Sets the y-coordinate of the projectile.
        参数:
        y - the new y-coordinate

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Gets the x-coordinate of the projectile.
        返回:
        the x-coordinate

      • getY

        public float getY()
        Gets the y-coordinate of the projectile.
        返回:
        the y-coordinate

        返回:

        参数:
        app - the PApplet object

      • setExplosionRadius

        public void setExplosionRadius(int explosionRadius)
        Sets the explosion radius of the projectile.
        参数:
        explosionRadius - the new explosion radius

      • getExplosionRadius

        public int getExplosionRadius()
        Gets the explosion radius of the projectile.
        返回:
